ID: CB1TP30_00
From: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-28 09:30
Subject: Fw: Join the AI Learning Journey with Chalhoub University!
--------------------------------------------------
Dear team,

Good day. As we all heard numerous times in the Seminar, AI is a crucial part of our Group Strategy.

This course is one of the first steps we are taking to set the foundation for embracing AI. Could we kindly request you to take a few minutes from your busy schedule to go through the course.

 Click here for direct access <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3339&section=1>  to the eLearning on Chalhoub University.  For the course to be deemed completed, you would also need to undertake a short quiz.

Thank you in advance and wishing you all the best in joining us on AI Learning journey!

Below is a snap shot of completion from countries:




Kind regards,
Sabitha
SABITHA MENON​​​​

PEOPLE PARTNER

REAL FZE

DUBAI

From: Sabitha Menon
Sent: Thursday, February 13, 2025 9:46 AM
Subject: Join the AI Learning Journey with Chalhoub University! 

Dear All,

Hope you are well!


Since we launched the GenAI eLearning as the Phase 1 of our AI Learning Strategy on 18 November 2024, we are seeing a very slow uptake.

We are very mindful that the programme was launched at the end of the year, and our busy schedules and end of year activities may have got in the way. AI courses equip you with the knowledge and skills to stay ahead in a rapidly evolving technological landscape. With the growing importance of AI in various industries, having a strong foundation in generative AI can significantly boost our ways of working with improved efficiency and speed.

Click here for direct access <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3339&section=1>  to the eLearning on Chalhoub University.  For the course to be deemed completed, you would also need to undertake a short quiz.

Thank you in advance and wishing you all the best in joining us on AI Learning journey!

Below is a snap shot of completion from countries:




 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=a06f627ce7&e=1f8b438af5>

Thank you in advance and wishing you all the best in joining us on AI Learning journey!

Below is a snap shot of completion from countries:




 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=a06f627ce7&e=1f8b438af5> 

 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=9161be0167&e=1f8b438af5> 

 

	

 

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/b1611428-9389-7c5e-bdf0-ed9bc473f5e6.png> 

 

	

 


We are thrilled to introduce Al Central on Chalhoub University — your go-to destination for AI learning.


 

AI Central is a dedicated page on Chalhoub University which is designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge needed to drive meaningful transformation across the group.

As part of this exciting launch, the "Generative AI for Everyone" e - Learning is now available. This programme is designed to help you gain a better understanding of Generative AI and how it can enhance day-to-day work. Access the AI learning tools using the links below!

 

	

 

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/69f99dca-7f5d-76a3-b545-3ad85d81748f.jpeg> 

Generative AI for Everyone <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=09a0fd0626&e=1f8b438af5>  
(e - Learning)

This programme, now available in both English and Arabic enables you to:

Generative AI for Everyone <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=09a0fd0626&e=1f8b438af5>  
(e - Learning)

This programme, now available in both English and Arabic enables you to:

*	Discover the foundations of Generative AI and how it works.
*	Explore the common applications of Generative AI.
*	Understand the impact of Gen AI on the Business.
*	Adopt a framework for responsible use of AI.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/0dc77b50-b4b3-7be7-820f-cadef61bf834.png> 

AI Toolbox <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=1ef313394b&e=1f8b438af5> 

A curated an AI Toolbox where you can learn about and recommend Gen AI tools. 

*	For text generation (Chat GPT 4.0, Google Gemini)
*	For image and video generation (Canva, Sora)
*	For task automation (PowerAutomate, Otter.ai)

 

Finish your learning and invite a colleague to join the #GenAIChallenge journey—let’s unlock the power of AI together!

 

	

 

Click below to explore the AI Central page.

 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=ab544e28b4&e=1f8b438af5>
